game.title: A Quest for Adventure
game.objective: Embark on a journey to retrieve the legendary Sword of Light
game.description: You have been chosen by the wise old wizard to find the sword, which is hidden in a treacherous dungeon. Along the way, you'll face challenges and meet allies.
game.reward: Rare artifacts and the honor of saving your village from an ancient evil

task.objective: Visit the Enchanted Forest to gather clues
task.description: Seek out the talking unicorn for guidance
